targets.query: SELECT count("result_num"), mean("duration"), max("duration"), mean("container_prep_time_u"), max("container_prep_time_u"), sum("duration"), sum("result_num")*100/count("result_num") FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("type" = 'upstream') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "job_name"
SELECT median("duration") FROM "build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m)
SELECT median("duration") FROM "build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "cloud", "region"
SELECT count("end") FROM "build" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "cloud", "region"
SELECT count("end") FROM "build" WHERE ( "result" = 'TIMED_OUT' ) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "cloud", "region"

panels.title: TIMED OUT Job count per cloud

targets.query: SELECT count("end") FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'TIMED_OUT' AND "result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "passed" = 'False' ) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "cloud", "region"
SELECT count("end") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' ) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "cloud", "region"
SELECT max("duration")  FROM "build" WHERE  ("job_name") = 'tripleo-ci-centos-7-containers-multinode'  GROUP BY time(30m)
